metadata.description: The Infestation is over, but the zombies remain! The robot forces are losing the war against these rotting masses, which leaves only one choice-head underground... never mind the fact that a possibly even greater threat is looming in the survivors' UnderCity shelter! All-new zombie-on-robot carnage by Ryall and artist Mark Torres!
metadata.name: Zombies vs. Robots: Undercity
